version_description: This update contains bug fixes and minor improvements.

We are super excited for our latest update to Sweet Escapes.  We've gone through every quest and added new art, new animations, new stories, new sound effects, and, of course, new puzzle experiences.  Oh! There's also a special indulgence waiting for you once you get through the first 100 levels...  Our all new Cupcake Run event.  Have fun playing and please tell us what you think.  We love feedback.  Thanks!
We are sorry but during the last update, a sneaky critter came into our bakery uninvited and we needed to squash it.  Thank you.

We’ve got a delicious new update for you that we’re sure you’re going to love.  We’ve made huge improvements to our underlying engine and added lots of new art, vfx and the ability to tap to skip so you can zip through those puzzles.  Enjoy!

- Build your dream Donut Shop with the help of Duncan the Tiger!
- 100 NEW Game Levels to play!
- Updated Story Flows with the NEW Chapters Feature!
- Kick start your Sweet Escape with NEW Starter Bundles!
- NEW delicious Game Pieces to collect and break!
- Updated graphics and Improved load times!

- Send and Receive Bonus, FREE Lives to Friends!
- Build the NEW Friendship Plaza with the help of your Friends!
- Updated Graphics!

- Updated Graphics!
- Bug fixes and game improvements!
Bug fixes and game improvements

- Updated Graphics
- Bug fixes and improvements

- Updated Graphics!
- Bug fixes and game improvements!

- Updated Graphics!
- Bug fixes and game improvements!

Come help the village of Sweet Escapes recover from the Great Sugar Crash. We now have over 400 levels to dig your sweet tooth into with 15 chapters of a fun and magical story filled with zany characters and a tasty world to explore and design.

- Updated Graphics!
- Bug fixes and game improvements!

See what we are baking with the latest update in Sweet Escapes!

NEW STORIES
The Malt Shop has opened up! Meet Cherry the poodle and bring the retro shake shop back to Sweet Escapes!
New Chapters added every Tuesday!

NEW PUZZLE PIECES
The Malt Shake! Clear blocks next to it to blast the board with a diagonal explosion!
The Oven! Clear blocks next to the oven to finish baking 2 Lava Cake bonus pieces for you to use!

NEW EVENT
Hot Cakes! Complete levels without losing a life to start levels with boosters!

- NEW Chapters have been added! Continue your Sweet Escapes adventure!
- Bug fixes and game improvements!

The Waffle Diner is opening up in Sweet Escapes! Check out new adventures and new levels to play today!

Play the NEW Rocket Ride Event! Collect Rocket Popsicles to earn sweet rewards!

NEW Butter Game Piece!
NEW Soufflé Game Piece!

Bug fixes and game improvements!

See what we are baking with the latest update in Sweet Escapes!

Big Updates in Sweet Escapes!

NEW STORIES
New Chapters added every Tuesday!

NEW EVENT
Trick or Treat! Sweet Escapes is ready for Halloween! Check out exclusive and spooky decorations available for a limited time!

Trick-Or-Sweet Event! Create Lava Cakes to win a ghastly decoration and other treats!

Jump back into Sweet Escapes with this new update!

NEW STORIES
- The Spicy Cocoa Festival is kicking off at Bean's Coffee Shop! Come see what's brewing!
- New Chapters added every Tuesday!

Big Updates in Sweet Escapes!

NEW STORIES
Bubba the Bear needs your help opening up the new Pie Shop in Sweet Escapes! Check out the new adventures and new levels to play!

New Chapters added every Tuesday!

Come back to Sweet Escapes with this new update!

Sweet Escapes is a Winter Wonderland! Stay tuned for upcoming holiday festivities!

NEW STORIES
New Chapters added every Tuesday!

Huge Holiday Sweet Escapes Update!

Sweet Escapes is a Winter Wonderland! Come enjoy the holiday festivities and earn exclusive prizes and limited time decorations!

NEW EVENTS
Events are live from December 12th - December 19th
- Free gifts for everyone in Sweet Escapes! Come in and open yours!
- Break the Ice Event! Create Rocket Popsicles to win an exclusive holiday decoration and other prizes!

NEW STORIES
New Chapters added every Tuesday!

Jump back into Sweet Escapes with this new update!

Sweet Escapes is a Winter Wonderland! Come enjoy the holiday festivities and earn exclusive prizes and limited time decorations!

NEW STORIES
The Pie Festival has begun, and we hope you're hungry enough for the pie eating contest! We know Scoops is ready for all he can eat! Join the festival crew and get to baking!

NEW PUZZLE PIECES
- Tray of Gingerbread! Clear blocks next to the Tray to add Gingerbread Men to the gameboard!
- Golden Turtle Egg! Clear blocks next to the Egg to free the chocolate turtle! The turtle will help clear objectives on the board!
- Bowl of Ice Cream! Clear blocks next an empty bowl to add a scoop of ice cream. Clear blocks of matching color to collect the Bowl of Ice Cream.

NEW STORIES
New Chapters added every Tuesday!

Major Sweet Escapes Update!

It's a new year in Sweet Escapes! Help Joy and friends prepare Bean's boat for a new adventure on Dessert Island! What exciting new sweets await??

NEW FEATURE
The Sweetstakes Food Truck Challenge has arrived in Sweet Escapes!
Join or Create a Team with other players! You can share lives and team up for special events! That's more Sweet Escapes to go around!


NEW EVENTS
Team up with other players to compete in the Food Truck Challenge! Win exclusive prizes and reach the top of the leaderboards!

NEW PUZZLE PIECES
Caramel Popcorn! Clear blocks next to the Caramel Popcorn buckets to shake popcorn free before you collect them!

NEW STORIES
New Chapters added every Tuesday!

Big Updates in Sweet Escapes!

And we're off! Join Joy and friends as they explore the new land, Dessert Island! Make new friends, build new decorations, and take on delicious new puzzles!

NEW EVENTS
The Bake-Off Event! Compete against other bakers to win exclusive prizes! Will you rise to the challenge?

Love is in the air! Come celebrate Valentine's Day in Sweet Escapes with exclusive decorations, prizes, and offers!

NEW PUZZLE PIECES
Candy Frogs! Collect Candy Frogs before they hop up up the puzzle board!
Soda Bottles! Collect blocks of matching colors to fill the soda bottle. When it's full, it'll burst and clear everything in its way!

NEW STORIES
New Chapters added every Tuesday!
